name: static-live-server
description: A simple static development live server that compares npm scripts, gulp, and webpack doing the same job. Built for my learning and for you to use.

scripts.build:css: npm run sass && npm run concat:css && npm run cssmin
scripts.build:js: npm run concat:js && npm run uglify
scripts.serve: browser-sync start --https --open external --server dist --files 'dist/css/*.css, dist/js/*.js, dist/*.html'
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:html" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:image" "npm run serve"
scripts.dev-server: npm run build && npm run watch

author: Matt Mawhinney
